moreBlocks.otherOffices: Ury & Moskow, LLC 1250 Connecticut Avenue, NW Suite 200 Washington, DC 20036 888-529-4335

description:
At Ury & Moskow, our Connecticut and Washington, DC attorneys have earned recognition, awards and the respect of other lawyers. This renown is based on demonstrated excellence in complex, adversarial proceedings at all levels of the state and Federal courts. We are at the forefront of large-scale pharmaceutical and medical products litigation, serious personal injury lawsuits business and civil litigation, including:

  • Appeals
  • Business Litigation
  • Banking & Commercial Law
  • Civil Litigation
  • Construction Law
  • Criminal Defense
  • Drug Litigation
  • Employment Law
  • Mediation and Arbitration Services
  • Medical Malpractice
  • Pardons of Criminal Records in Connecticut
  • Personal Injury â€“ Wrongful Death
  • Physician Disciplinary Matters
  • Real Estate Corporate Issues

    Read more about our practice areas.

Our firm acts as regional counsel to many individual, business and commercial clients and is known for providing high quality legal services in a broad range of areas. Our personal injury / wrongful death trial lawyers at Ury & Moskow are well-regarded for their commitment to the thorough preparation and presentation of personal injury lawsuits on behalf of injured clients throughout Connecticut and in New York, New Jersey, Massachusetts, Washington, DC and Louisiana.

Not every personal injury attorney is a trial lawyer capable of mounting substantial litigation against insurance companies and their clients. At Ury & Moskow, we have successfully negotiated and litigated numerous successful personal injury lawsuits, recovering substantial damage awards on behalf of our clients as compensation for pain and suffering, lost wages, medical bills and long-term care.

Potential clients are invited to contact the Fairfield, Connecticut offices of Ury & Moskow today for a free consultation and case review. A member of our legal staff will return your inquiry promptly and schedule an appointment with the attorneys in our Connecticut or Washington, DC office best able to address your immediate needs.
